overview: Hard X proudly presents Facialized Vol. 6, featuring four sensational starlets all experiencing their very 1st blowbangs! Starring brunette knockout Ivy Lebelle (10 guys), beautiful Paige Owens (6 guys), petite cutie Lily Adams (6 guys), and gorgeous hottie Eliza Ibarra (6 guys). If you love facials then you will love Facialized Vol. 6. Directed by the award winning Mason, this is an epic release not to be missed.
title: Facialized 6
